title: Help! I have a bug on the download! :(
body:
Sorry for english i use the translator google for do this. 

English: 

_I have a problem downloading the game.
The first part, which is the new launcher if it works, but after that, I get the new version of the game, when you put scanning files, it works, but after that is the downloading, it stays at 0, I have Tried to wait UNTIL 7 hours, but it does not work still at 0. I have tried to reinstall it but neither._

~~PLEASE HELP!~~

Spanish: (**I put this because I do not know if there is any language restriction: X**)

_Tengo un problema al descargar el juego.
La primera parte, que es la del launcher nuevo si que funciona, pero después de esa, me sale la de la versión nueva del juego, cuando pone escaneando archivos, funciona, pero después que es la de descargando, se queda en 0, he probado a esperar HASTA 7 horas, pero no funciona sigue en 0. He probado a reinstalarlo pero tampoco._

~~PORFAVOR AYUDA!~~

Do it for {{champion:103}} :´(

replies.body: That client update could be getting stuck if it doesn't have the admin rights to be able to patch those game files. Make sure you update your permissions which you can get done by following this handy [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide.
